title: Improve serializer error message
body_html:
You're meant to use torch.save(model.state_dict(), filename) to serialize pytorch models, but if instead you use torch.save(model, filename), and there are non-leaf variables accessible as model attributes, the error message isn't very helpful:
RuntimeError: serialization of non-leaf variables is not implemented yet

body:
You're meant to use `torch.save(model.state_dict(), filename)` to serialize pytorch models, but if instead you use `torch.save(model, filename)`, and there are non-leaf variables accessible as model attributes, the error message isn't very helpful:
`RuntimeError: serialization of non-leaf variables is not implemented yet`
